law.catch_line: Transfer Of Funds Among Items Of Appropriation For Joint Legislative Expenses
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The speaker of the house of representatives and the president of the senate, acting jointly, may transfer funds, as needed, among the items of appropriation for joint legislative expenses. Chapter 29: Transfer of funds among items of appropriation for joint legislative expenses [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The speaker of the house of representatives and the president of the senate, acting jointly, may transfer funds, as needed, among the items of appropriation for joint legislative expenses.
